channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Second detainee dies after shooting at Dallas ICE facility

item.title: The UN mission appeals to the Taliban to restore internet access in Afghanistan
item.description: The outage was the first nationwide shutdown since the Taliban returned to power in August 2021 and was part of their professed crackdown on immoralit...

item.title: Energy Dept. tells employees not to use words including 'climate change' and 'green'
item.description: The banned words list applies to all work done at the largest federal funder of clean energy technology.

item.title: With therapy hard to get, people lean on AI for mental health. What are the risks?

item.title: Flights in Afghanistan grounded after internet shutdown
item.description: The Taliban have yet to give an official reason for the shutdown, but said it would last indefinitely.

item.title: For Netanyahu, avoiding a peace deal may now be worse than agreeing one
item.description: Trump is asking the Israeli PM to risk his government but dangling the prospect of a historic legacy, writes Lucy Williamson.

item.title: Family’s attorney questions Universal’s response to roller coaster injuries after man’s death

item.title: Watch: What do Gazans and Israelis think of Trump's plan?
item.description: People in Gaza and Jerusalem share their reactions to the US president's new strategy for ending the war.

item.title: What to know about President Trump's plan to send National Guard to Portland

item.title: Trump, Hegseth rally troops at rare meeting, rail against "woke" standards
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth touted the new name, the Department of War, saying "the era of the Department of Defense is over."

item.title: Hegseth and Trump reiterate 'warrior' ethos in remarks to top US generals
item.description: The defence secretary outlined his vision for the Pentagon, which includes implementing “high and gender-neutral” physical fitness standards.

item.title: Chinese woman convicted after 'world's biggest' bitcoin seizure
item.description: UK police seized crypto worth over £5bn from Zhimin Qian, who was known as 'the goddess of wealth'.

item.description: Deadline looming for government shutdown; Celebrating 50 years of service dog training.

item.title: Lawyer for suspect in Charlie Kirk killing wants more time to review ‘voluminous’ evidence
